item.title: Tony & Jessica, Part 2
item.description: This continues the loving adventures of Tony and his 9yo daughter Jessica after the death of his wife, Sara.

item.title: Tony & Jessica, Part 1
item.description: A newly widowed father can no longer resist his daughter; they become lovers and embark on many horny adventures together.

item.title: Progress Report #2: Dennie & Friends
item.description: PR2: Friday, September 29, 1978 I was cooking breakfast when Dennie came into the kitchen. “Good Morning, Kid,” I said. “Good morning, Dad,” she replied sleepily. I knew that she knew that I knew that she had watched her mother and I fucking last night, but her behavior and attitude toward me hadn’t changed noticeably. She gave me her usual good morning hug and I gave her the usual kiss on the top of her head.

item.title: Playtoy Baby, Part 2
item.description: Baby-whore continues the tale of her perverted childhood. Rewritten for Loliwood Studios.

item.title: Little Girl Bound
item.description: Father paints his 9-year-old daughter, naked and tied up.

item.title: Catcall
item.description: Little Kirsty danced and stripped for the women at the lesbian club and ignored their calls and lewd comments, but someone out there knew who she was...
